company_info.Company Description: Easy Home Based Works Are Available For Workers Around The World.Nature of BusinessPromotion of Tourism Services.IncomeYou Can Earn Up To Rs.4000 To 6000 Per Week.BenefitNo Time Bound, No Skill Required.Complete Training Provided To All Active Members.All Payments Are Weekly Basis.Worldwide Required Limited Vacancies

api_data.job_title: We Urgently Require Candidates For Online Part/Full Time Promotion Work In Touri

jd_information.description: Greetings From Unique Tourism services!Unique Travelite ServicesIs A Leading Organization In Tourism Industry, Dealing In Flights/Holidays (Like Vacation/Honeymoon/Family/Picnic/Group Tour And Customized Packages Which Are Also In Our List Of Offers) This Also Includes Hotels/Buses/ Volvos/Private Taxies/Site Seeing/Travel Guides Etc. Candidates Are Required To Promote Travel & Tourism On Behalf Of Unique Travelite Services Among The Clients Online As Well As Off Line. Working On Promotion Of Referrals And Other Designated Platforms Of The Organization Will Also Be The Responsibility Of The Candidate Which In Turn Will Lead To Maximization Of Income. Age And Qualification No Bar For The Right Candidate Opportunity Exists On First Come First BasisCandidates Meeting Above Requirements MayNOTE:-Please Contact me BEFORE 11 am & AFTER 3 pm on all working days.HR MANAGERMISS SALMA CONTACT NO 9210245755
